Plot: Did the Nazis ever see Charlie Chaplin's 'The Great Dictator'? Yugoslavia, 1942 - The young Serbian projectionist Nikola Radosevic decides to teach the German oppressors a lesson they won't...
Title: Great
Writer: Andreas Henn, Gawain Mallinckrodt, Alexander von Wasielewski
Actors: Milos Bikovic, Sebastian Brummer, Raphael Dwinger, Mirijam Verena Jeremic
